name: Santa Hat Cookies
author: Pillsbury
summary: These Santa hats are impressively easy and sure to be a hit at your holiday party.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package Pillsbury® Ready to Bake!™ sugar cookies
½ teaspoon red gel food color
directions: Roll each half into a ball
Place 1 inch apart on ungreased cookie sheets
Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until edges are set and golden brown
Cool 5 minutes on cookie sheets before removing to cooling rack
To make frosting, in large bowl, beat marshmallow creme and softened butter with electric mixer on medium speed until blended
Beat in powdered sugar until fluffy
Add food color, and beat until well combined
Place frosting in resealable food-storage plastic bag
Cut off 1 tiny corner of bag
Pipe frosting, piling up in hat shape, on top of each cookie
Top each hat with miniature marshmallow
Gently press sprinkles around bottom edge of each hat so they stick to frosting
